document_data.name: ''The War between Selûne and Shar''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The War between Selûne and Shar''''' was a religious [[book]] that detailed the relationship between and origins of [[Selûne]] and [[Shar]], the original two goddess-sisters of [[Toril]].
document_data.Content: The book spoke of the nature of each goddess, how Selûne shone with brilliant radiance, and Shar offered her own form of enticing darkness. The two sisters complemented each other, and all of the Realms around them, providing light and darkness.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a copy of ''The War between Selûne and Shar'' could be found in a secluded shrine to Selûne located a bit ways outside the village of [[Moonhaven]].
